result.markdown:
--- title: typecast --- ## Atomic and List Type Casting With Names and Dimensions Preserved {.unnumbered} ### Description Type casting usually strips away attributes of objects.
The functions provided here preserve dimensions, dimnames, and names, which may be more convenient for arrays and array-like objects.

The functions are as follows:
  • as_bool(): converts object to atomic type logical (TRUE, FALSE, NA).
  • as_int(): converts object to atomic type integer.
  • as_dbl(): converts object to atomic type double (AKA numeric).
  • as_chr(): converts object to atomic type character.
  • as_cplx(): converts object to atomic type complex.
  • as_raw(): converts object to atomic type raw.
  • as_list(): converts object to recursive type list.
as_num() is an alias for as_dbl().
as_str() is an alias for as_chr().

See also typeof.

### Usage 
as_bool(x, ...)

as_int(x, ...)

as_dbl(x, ...)

as_num(x, ...)

as_chr(x, ...)

as_str(x, ...)

as_cplx(x, ...)

as_raw(x, ...)

as_list(x, ...)
### Arguments
x an R object.
... further arguments passed to or from other methods.
### Value The converted object.

### Examples ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library("broadcast") # matrix example ==== x <- matrix(sample(-1:28), ncol = 5) colnames(x) <- month.name[1:5] rownames(x) <- month.abb[1:6] names(x) <- c(letters[1:20], LETTERS[1:10]) print(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 23 15 4 7 17 Feb 26 21 18 16 3 Mar 2 28 5 6 9 Apr 8 27 1 20 14 May 25 12 -1 13 19 Jun 24 10 0 22 11 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_bool(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Feb TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Mar TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Apr TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE May TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Jun TRUE TRUE FALSE TRUE TRUE attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_int(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 23 15 4 7 17 Feb 26 21 18 16 3 Mar 2 28 5 6 9 Apr 8 27 1 20 14 May 25 12 -1 13 19 Jun 24 10 0 22 11 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_dbl(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 23 15 4 7 17 Feb 26 21 18 16 3 Mar 2 28 5 6 9 Apr 8 27 1 20 14 May 25 12 -1 13 19 Jun 24 10 0 22 11 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_chr(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan "23" "15" "4" "7" "17" Feb "26" "21" "18" "16" "3" Mar "2" "28" "5" "6" "9" Apr "8" "27" "1" "20" "14" May "25" "12" "-1" "13" "19" Jun "24" "10" "0" "22" "11" attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_cplx(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 23+0i 15+0i 4+0i 7+0i 17+0i Feb 26+0i 21+0i 18+0i 16+0i 3+0i Mar 2+0i 28+0i 5+0i 6+0i 9+0i Apr 8+0i 27+0i 1+0i 20+0i 14+0i May 25+0i 12+0i -1+0i 13+0i 19+0i Jun 24+0i 10+0i 0+0i 22+0i 11+0i attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_raw(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 17 0f 04 07 11 Feb 1a 15 12 10 03 Mar 02 1c 05 06 09 Apr 08 1b 01 14 0e May 19 0c 00 0d 13 Jun 18 0a 00 16 0b attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ################################################################################ # factor example ==== x <- factor(month.abb, levels = month.abb) names(x) <- month.name print(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug September October November December Sep Oct Nov Dec Levels: Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_bool(as_int(x) > 6) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE TRUE TRUE September October November December TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_int(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 September October November December 9 10 11 12 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_dbl(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 September October November December 9 10 11 12 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_chr(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August "Jan" "Feb" "Mar" "Apr" "May" "Jun" "Jul" "Aug" September October November December "Sep" "Oct" "Nov" "Dec" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_cplx(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1+0i 2+0i 3+0i 4+0i 5+0i 6+0i 7+0i 8+0i September October November December 9+0i 10+0i 11+0i 12+0i ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_raw(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 September October November December 09 0a 0b 0c ``` ::: :::
